description: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below.
full_summary:
# **Tender Notice**

## **Title: Valve/Diaphragm**

The Department of National Defence is seeking proposals for the procurement of valves and diaphragms for specific Navy Ships. The delivery will be made to CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia, and CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia.

## **Goods and Services Requirements:**

* Item 1: Valve, Check, NSN: 21-908-1085 (8 EA)
* Item 2: Valve, Check, NSN: 21-908-1085 (6 EA)
* Item 3: Diaphragm, Actuator Valve, Special Shaped, NSN: 21-909-4379 (29 EA)
* Item 4: Diaphragm, Actuator Valve, Special Shaped, NSN: 21-909-4379 (22 EA)
* Item 5: Diaphragm, Actuator Valve, Special Shaped, NSN: 21-909-4834 (15 EA)
* Item 6: Diaphragm, Actuator Valve, Special Shaped, NSN: 21-909-4834 (15 EA)

All items are to be delivered to specified Navy Ships at CFB Halifax and CFB Esquimalt. Suppliers must propose equivalent or substitute products, indicating brand name, model, and/or Part Number and NCAGE code.

## **Bidder Requirements:**

* Bids must be submitted in Canadian dollars. Bids in foreign currency will be rejected.
* A preference is given to Canadian goods and/or services.
* The Crown reserves the right to negotiate with suppliers for any procurement.

## **Important Documents:**

The following documents may be submitted in either French or English:

* English Version: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/4931/w8482-241461-english-rfp-clauses.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/4931/w8482-241461-english-rfp-clauses.pdf)
* French Version: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/4931/w8482-241461-french-rfp-clauses_0.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/4931/w8482-241461-french-rfp-clauses_0.pdf)
